segments.name: senderReceiverSiteCode
segments.description: The CBP assigned code for the ‘data processing’ site/location of the transmitter (i.e., both sender of the batch and recipient of the response).

segments.name: senderReceiverIdCode
segments.description: Transmitter’s identification code (as assigned by CBP).

segments.name: communicationPassword
segments.description: A pre-established password used to authorize the transmitter of the data.

segments.name: transmissionDate
segments.description:
Transmitter’s date of batch transmission. These positions are returned, unmodified, in the A-Record returned in the response to the batch (format MMDDYY).

Space fill if not used.

segments.name: applicationIdentifierCode
segments.description: A code that identifies the type of transaction data within the batch.

segments.name: senderReceiverOfficeCode
segments.description:
A code agreed upon by the transmitter and CBP representing a specific ‘office’ (or sub-location).

Space fill if not used

segments.name: transmitterSUserDataText
segments.description:
Provided for the transmitter's internal use. These positions are returned, unmodified, in the A-Record returned in the response to the batch.

Space fill if not used.
